title: Informal neighborhood care and mutual aid provision
description: Informal neighborhood care and mutual aid provision
content:
Scenario: Informal neighborhood care and mutual aid provision
    Given Margaret helps neighbors with various small needs
    And she receives help from neighbors when needed
    When the neighborhood_elohim tracks mutual aid
    Then it should recognize Margaret's care contributions to neighbors
    And it should track reciprocal neighborhood support
    And small acts of care should accumulate as care tokens
    And neighborhood care economy should be visible and valued
    And mutual aid should strengthen neighborhood bonds
    And Margaret should build neighborhood care relationships
